de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.businessrules.client

Interface IClientOperatorMode


  • public interface IClientOperatorMode
    This methods are called from the context of Mail-Inbox.
    Information: Because in Operator-Mode no binding exists to a specified project the Businness-Rules will be called in ClientOperatorMode. The methods in the rule have to modify because many calls (for many projects) has not influence on the result.

    was:
    ClientOperatorMode.java

      Is called if the wait loop has been interrupted.
